summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unidentified recipient regarding trial preparation for a witness in a trial scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021. The email includes scheduling for a WebEx meeting and an in-person meeting, and attaches a trial subpoena.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, coordinating trial preparation and scheduling meetings with a witness and their attorney for an upcoming trial.

events.title: Trial scheduled to begin
events.description: A trial is scheduled to begin on this date, and the prosecution team is preparing a witness to testify.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A trial related to the Epstein case was scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.
The prosecution team was preparing to call a witness to testify at this trial.
A trial subpoena was issued to the witness, as mentioned in the attached document.
The email coordinates scheduling for both a virtual WebEx meeting and an in-person preparation meeting at the prosecutor's office.
